_note: Add this configuration to your AstrBot platform configuration array
_authentication_option_2: Or use access token authentication (remove password if using this)
_instructions: 1. Create a Matrix account for your bot on your chosen homeserver
2. Set matrix_user_id to your bot's full Matrix ID (e.g., @botname:matrix.org)
3. Either set matrix_password OR matrix_access_token (not both)
4. Set enable to true to activate the adapter
5. Invite your bot to Matrix rooms and start chatting!
_security_notes: Use dedicated bot accounts, not personal accounts
Consider homeserver policies and rate limits
Test with small groups before deploying widely
